Query.restProxy.name: Proxy
Query.restProxy.description: Proxy your rest endpoint to GraphQL Schema

passedHeaders.name: Passed headers
passedHeaders.description: Names of headers to pass from `/graphql` request to rest proxy

headers.name: Request headers
headers.description: Insert request headers for REST in format Key:Value

body.name: REST endpoint body
body.description: REST endpoint body serialized as JSON.

url.name: REST endpoint
url.description: REST endpoint to map to. Accepts values with $ at the beginning from the GraphQL Query.
